TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UserTrackingLocation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 定義對應根工作流程執行個體潛在執行路徑中的使用者事件的活動限定位置。

span.span: Defines an activity-qualified location that corresponds to a user event in the potential execution path of a root workflow instance.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 活動設計工具或工作流程設計工具可使用任何多載的 和 方法，以指揮工作流程發出資料到執行階段追蹤基礎結構做為使用者事件。An activity designer or a workflow designer may use any of the overloaded and methods to instrument the workflow to emit data to the runtime tracking infrastructure as a user event. 發出的資料稱為使用者資料。The data emitted is referred to as user data. 有別於活動狀態事件，以及只發生在活動或工作流程狀態變更時的工作流程狀態事件，使用者事件可能發生在工作流程中指示的任何位置。Unlike activity status events, and workflow status events, which occur only on activity or workflow status changes, user events can occur at any location that is instrumented in a workflow. 會指定使用者資料類型、必須發出資料的活動類型、可更精確地限定此活動之執行個體的條件集合、使用者資料必須與其產生關聯的索引鍵名稱 (選擇性)、是否應比對使用者資料的衍生類型，以及是否應比對衍生自指定活動類型之活動上發出的使用者資料，藉此定義這類位置的比對參數。A defines the matching parameters for such a location by specifying the type of the user data, the type of the activity from which it must be emitted, a collection of conditions that can more precisely qualify an instance or instances of this activity, an optional key name with which the user data must be associated, whether derived types of the user data should be matched, and whether user data emitted from activities derived from the type of the specified activity should be matched. > [!NOTE] > 單一 可能會參考工作流程執行個體潛在執行路徑中的多個實際位置。A single may refer to more than one actual location in the potential execution path of a workflow instance. 您可以將 加入至 或 中，以定義 中 的比對參數。You may add a to either or in order to define the match parameters for a in a . 執行階段追蹤基礎結構比對 必須依下列順序符合三個一般條件：發出使用者事件的活動必須符合 、、 和 指定的活動集合；如果存在與使用者資料關聯的索引鍵，則這個索引鍵必須符合 ；使用者事件發出的使用者資料型別必須符合 、 和 指定的使用者資料型別集合。There are three general conditions which must be met in the following order for the to be matched by the runtime tracking infrastructure: the activity that has emitted a user event must match the set of activities specified by , , , and ; the key, if one exists, associated with the user data must match ; and, the type of the user data emitted by the user event must match the set of user data types specified by , , and . 只有這三個條件全都符合時，執行階段追蹤基礎結構才會將 視為符合。Only if all three of these conditions are met, does the runtime tracking infrastructure consider the matched. 若要設定 ，您必須將 或 設為指定要比對的使用者資料型別，並且將 或 設為指定要比對且必須發出使用者資料的來源活動型別。To configure a , you must set either or to specify the type of the user data to be matched and either or to specify the type of the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be matched. 您可以將 物件加入至 中，以便更完整地限定發出使用者資料的來源活動。You may add objects to to more completely qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted. 您可以將 設為指定應比對衍生自 或 指定之使用者資料型別的使用者資料，也可以將 設為指定應比對衍生自 或 指定之活動型別的活動所發出的使用者資料。You may set to specify that user data derived from the user data type specified by or should be matched, and you may set to specify that user data emitted from activities derived from the activity type specified by or should be matched. 您可以將 設為指定只針對此 比對與指定之索引鍵名稱關聯的使用者資料。You may set to specify that only user data associated with the specified key name should be matched for this . 如果 是 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 `Nothing`)，執行階段追蹤結構將不會試著比對與使用者資料關聯的索引鍵。If is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), the runtime tracking structure will not try to match the key associated with the user data.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設的建構函式會初始化空的 。The default constructor initializes an empty . 若要比對，您必須指定要比對的使用者資料型別，以及發出使用者資料的來源活動型別。You must specify both the type of the user data to match and the type of the activity from which it must be emitted in order to be matched. 因此，若要設定 ，您必須明確地將 或 設為指定要比對且發出使用者資料的來源活動型別，並且明確地將 或 設為指定要比對的使用者資料型別。Therefore, to configure the you must explicitly set either or to specify the type of an activity from which user data must be emitted to be matched, and you must also explicitly set either or to specify the type of the user data to be matched. 您可以進一步設定 ，做法是設定它的其他屬性。You may further configure the by setting its other properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須指定活動型別的非限定名稱。You must specify the unqualified name of the type of the activity. 例如，若要指定 活動的非限定名稱，請將 設定為 "Code"。For example, to specify the unqualified name of a activity, set to "Code". 提供了一種方式，可讓您在直接以 XML 撰寫設定檔時更輕鬆地指定發出使用者資料的活動型別。 provides a much easier way to specify the type of the activity that emits the user data when you author a profile directly in XML. 也提供一種與版本無關的方式，讓您針對活動型別進行參考。 also provides a version-independent way of referring to the type of the activity. 您必須指定 或 ，才能適當地設定 。You must specify either or to properly configure the .

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Conditions As TrackingConditionCollection

summary.span: 取得用於限定活動的條件集合，這個活動是要追蹤且必須發出使用者資料的來源活動。

span.span: Gets a collection of conditions that are used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted to be tracked.

value.span: ，用於限定必須發出使用者資料的來源活動。

span.span: A that is used to qualify the activity from which the user data must be emitted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要比對追蹤位置，您可以使用 更精確地定義 或 指定之活動型別的執行個體，這兩個位置是必須發出使用者事件的來源位置。You can use to more precisely define the instance of the activity type specified by or from which the user event must be emitted to match the tracking location. 例如，如果您只想要比對 等於 "MyCode" 的 活動，則可以將 設定為 "Code" 並將 加入至 ，後者會指定活動執行個體的 ID 屬性必須等於 "MyCode"。For example, if you want to match only activities with an equal to "MyCode", you can set to "Code" and add an to that specifies that the ID property of the activity instance must be equal to "MyCode". 中的每個 都必須是 true，才能比對活動。Every in must be true for the activity to be matched.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定名稱，使用者資料必須與此名稱建立關聯才能比對 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name with which the user data must be associated for the to be matched.

value.span: 索引鍵，使用者資料必須與此索引鍵關聯才能比對 ，否則為 null 參考 (在 Visual Basic 中為 )。

span.span: A key with which the user data must be associated for the to be matched or a null reference ( in Visual Basic).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活動設計工具或工作流程設計工具可使用 或 ，使字串索引鍵和使用者事件中發出的使用者資料產生關聯。An activity designer or a workflow designer can use either or to associate a string key with the user data that is emitted in a user event. 如果 不是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，則與使用者資料關聯的索引鍵必須符合 的值才能比對 。If is not a null reference (`Nothing`), the key associated with the user data must match the value of for the to be matched. 如果 是 null 參考 (`Nothing`)，則執行階段追蹤基礎結構不會檢查符合的索引鍵，以判斷是否比對 。If is a null reference (`Nothing`), the runtime tracking infrastructure does not check for a matching key to determine whether the is matched.
